title: AT&T To Offer The Microsoft Surface 3 To Business Customers
text: AT&T To Offer The Microsoft Surface 3 To Business Customers »   Published on 2015-09-16 07:47:50 AT&T To Offer The Microsoft Surface 3 To Business Customers -- DALLAS, Sept.  - AT&T Inc. AT&T Inc. <-  <- stripped tags -> DALLAS , Sept.  - [[UEdFZ2NtVnNQVndpYm05bWIyeHNiM2RjSWlCdmJtTnNhV05yUFNkc2FXNXJUMjVEYkdsamF5aDBhR2x6S1NjZ2FISmxaajFjSW1oMGRIQnpPaTh2ZDNkM0xtRjBkQzVqYjIwdloyVnVMMnhoYm1ScGJtY3RjR0ZuWlhNL2NHbGtQVE16TURsY0lpQnlaV3c5WENKdWIyWnZiR3h2ZDF3aUlIUmhjbWRsZEQxY0lsOWliR0Z1YTF3aVBrRlVKbFE4TDJFK3w=]] 1 will begin selling the Microsoft Surface 3 with Windows 8.1 Pro to business customers in the coming weeks. It will be connected to the nation's most reliable 4G LTE network with the nation's strongest 4G LTE signal. 2 It's powerful enough to replace your laptop. It has all the benefits of the Surface 3 plus additional features for businesses. The Surface 3 with Windows 8.1 Pro is upgradeable to Windows 10. It has 4GB RAM and 128GB of storage – the perfect amount of power and performance for the mobile professional. It also has enhanced data encryption, remote desktop connection and domain join, which allows the tablet to securely connect to company domains. With accessories like the optional Type Cover keyboard and Surface Pen (accessories sold separately), you will be able to work like you're in the office when you're on the go. Well qualified business customers can purchase the Surface 3 with Windows 8.1 Pro for $37.50 with installment pricing. 3 It is also available for $649 .99 with a two-year wireless service agreement 4 or no annual commitment for $749.99 . 5 For more information about the Microsoft Surface 3 with Windows 8.1 Pro, visit [[]]. Tax due at sale. If wireless service cancelled, device balance due. Other charges and restrictions apply.
